name: RIDEOUT
description:
Welcome to RIDEOUT - a prototype of a game we're interested in producing.

This game throws you into a forest with spiders surrounding you from every direction.  A plane flies above and drops a crate of weapons for you to defend yourself with. It's up to you now to survive for as long as possible.

Tips

  • More and more spiders attack you each wave. 
  • Each spider has a chance to drop either a medkit or ammobox.
  • The plane drops 2-4 different weapons each game.

Default Controls
W: Move Forward
A: Move Left
S: Move Backward
D: Move Right
Space: Jump
E: Pickup Item
Q: Drop Item
Shift: Sprint
CTRL: Crouch
LMB: Attack / Fire
RMB: Aim

Note:  Keep in mind, this game is in prototype phase and likely has more than a few bugs. Expect lots of changes. Thank you for checking out our game. Stay tuned and enjoy!
